DataElement.preferredName: Patient Assessment Post Surgery Timeline Eligibility Determination Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator related to criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services based on assessment time after surgery.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Assessment Post Surgery Timeline Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services based on assessment time after surgery.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Assessment Post Surgery Timeline Eligibility Determination
Property.preferredDefinition: Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.:Post; occuring after.:A specialty in which manual or operative procedures are used in the treatment of disease, injuries, or deformities.:A chronological schedule of when activities or events occurred or will occur.:Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.
Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
The branch of medical science that treats disease or injury by operative procedures.
A chronological schedule of when activities or events occurred or will occur.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: GOG CRF:Gynecologic Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has it been at least 2 weeks
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has it been at least 2 weeks but not more than 12 weeks after initial surgery performed for the combined purpose of diagnosis, staging and cytoreduction?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient have initial surgery for combined purpose of diagnosis, staging, and cytoreduction between 1 and 12 weeks before entering study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was the patient enrolled between 1 and 8 weeks after initial (staging) surgery was performed, for the combined purpose of diagnosis and staging?

DataElement.origin: GOG CRF:Gynecologic Oncology Group Case Report Form
